trans-unit.source: Provides functionality for a stack of client channel sinks that must be invoked during an asynchronous message response decoding.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkStack> is used during processing of responses to asynchronous calls.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkStack> wird während der Verarbeitung der Antworten auf asynchrone Aufrufe verwendet.

trans-unit.source: During a synchronous call, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called when a message is outbound to the server.
trans-unit.target: Bei einem synchronen Aufruf der <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> Methode wird aufgerufen, wenn eine Nachricht an den Server gesendet wird.

trans-unit.source: Each sink in the sink chain calls the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A> method on the next sink until the call reaches the transport sink at the end of the chain.
trans-unit.target: Jede Senke in der Senkenkette ruft die <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A> Methode für die nächste Senke, bis der Aufruf die Transportsenke am Ende der Kette erreicht.

trans-unit.source: From there the message is transported to the server.
trans-unit.target: Von dort aus wird die Nachricht an den Server übertragen.

trans-unit.source: When the formatter sink is called through the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink.AsyncProcessMessage%2A> method, it dispatches the call asynchronously by calling <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A> on the next channel sink.
trans-unit.target: Wenn die Formatierungssenke aufgerufen wird, über die <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink.AsyncProcessMessage%2A> -Methode, es leitet den Aufruf asynchron durch Aufruf <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A> auf den nächsten Kanal Senke.

trans-unit.source: A stack of reply sinks is needed to process the response.
trans-unit.target: Ein Stapel von Antwortsenken ist erforderlich, um die Antwort zu verarbeiten.

trans-unit.source: Any sink that wants to process the response needs to push itself to the client channel sink stack inside of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Jede Senke, die die Antwort verarbeiten möchte muss sich an den Client Senke Kanalstapel innerhalb eines push <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The sink to remove and return from the sink stack.
Pops the information associated with all the sinks from the sink stack up to and including the specified sink.
Information generated on the request side and associated with the specified sink.
The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
for operating with infrastructure code.
Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
The sink to push onto the sink stack.
Information generated on the request side that is needed on the response side.
Pushes the specified sink and information associated with it onto the sink stack.

The information generated on the request side and specified in the `state` parameter is returned in the `state` parameter of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A> method on the corresponding sink.
trans-unit.target: Die Informationen auf der Anforderungsseite generiert und im angegebenen der `state` Parameter zurückgegeben, der `state` Parameter von der <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A> Methode für die entsprechende Senke.

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
for operating with infrastructure code.
Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
